# Byte-compiled / optimized / DLL files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# CPython
*.pyc
*.pyo
*.pyd

# Python virtual environments
venv/
env/
.Python
pip-log.txt
pip-delete-this-directory.txt

# macOS DS_Store
.DS_Store

# Editors
.vscode/
*.swp

# Jupyter Notebook
.ipynb_checkpoints/

# Local configuration
.idea/
*.sqlite3
*.pyc
*.bak
*.bak/
*.log
*.cache

# Ignore pipenv virtual environment
/.venv

# Ignore local development settings
local_settings.py

# Ignore production environment variables
.env

# Ignore PyInstaller build outputs
/dist/
/build/

# Ignore Django generated files
*.log
*.pot
*.pyc
__pycache__/
local_settings.py
db.sqlite3
media/

# Ignore Sphinx documentation build output
/docs/_build/

# Ignore coverage reports
.coverage
htmlcov/

# Ignore pytest cache
.cache/
pytest_cache/

# Ignore distutils build directory
.build/

# Ignore system-specific files
*.swp
Thumbs.db

# Ignorar archivos de configuración de macOS
.DS_Store
# Carpetas específicas de macOS
/.Spotlight-V100
/.Trashes
/.fseventsd

# Varios archivos de sistema de macOS
.AppleDouble
.LSOverride
